body.name: COLAMY Office Chair-Ergonomic Computer Desk Chair with Thick Seat for Comfort, High Back Executive Chair with Padded Flip-up Arms, Stylish Leather Chair with Upgraded Caster for Swivel (Black, 300lbs)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 39 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: ✅【Fashionable Home Office Chair】COLAMY newly upgraded office chair with eye-catching outlook makes your office chair no longer ordinary and matches with office, home, study and meeting room. Of course, COMFORT is the first essence of the office chair! Advanced ergonomic design and thick bonded upholstered leather are used to ensure strong support

✅【Luxury Upgraded Casters】Upgraded large caliber nylon casters, which are more solid and fashionable, more flexible for swivel rolling. Also, the caster is friendly to any floors and will not cause scratches. No floor mat is extra required. When swivel or rolling, there will be no abnormal noise, help you create a more efficient and silent working environment. The upgraded casters are not easy to fall off from the chair, durable enough for years of use

✅【Made for All-day Comfort】Adopt advanced ergonomic design and invest in materials! High backrest and bionic spine contour help keep your spine in a relaxed state and maintain the correct sitting posture. The headrest is thickened in three layers to ensure when you lean on it, you can feel the ultimate soft support; The seat cushion is wider and double padded to offer a soft sitting feeling and long-lasting support. Padded flip-up armrests provide optimal support for forearms without cold touch

✅【Fully Adjustable】Flip-up armrests improve flexibility for space-saving, excellent choice for working-from-home chair. Seat height can be adjusted between 18.9"-22". Pull the left lever to enjoy rocking from 90°-113°. With this office chair you can get the most comfortable sitting experience under different conditions, relax your back muscles and increase blood circulation while working and immersing yourself in study and gaming in front of your desk

✅【Trustworthy Quality】Thick bonded and skin-friendly leather material provides soft-touch. The points on the leather can effectively prevent the leather from cracking. Strong integrated metal frame and heavy duty nylon base made the chair withstand up to 300lbs. Class 3 gas lift cylinder offering a more safe protection

✅【First-Class Customer Service】Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! We offer a one-year warranty. All ergonomic desk chair comes with all the hardware and necessary tools. It can easily be installed and ready to use in about 10-15 minutes. If you have any questions about our chairs, please inform the manufacturer which written on the manual instructions, we will spare no effort to assist you to solve any problem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Outstanding Chair - Smooth Wheels, Spacious & Cozy!
reviews.reviewText: I am thoroughly impressed with this chair! The assembly process was incredibly straightforward - the included allen-wrench with a handle made it a hassle-free experience.Firstly, the wheels are a standout feature. They glide effortlessly, offering a level of smoothness that surpasses any other office chair I've used. It's clear that the construction of these wheels was a priority, and it shows in their performance.Another aspect I adore is the adjustable arms. They can easily be lifted, which is a huge space-saver in tighter work areas. This feature adds to the chair's overall practicality and ergonomic design.The backrest deserves a special mention too. It's thoughtfully padded, providing excellent support, and the integrated headrest is both comfortable and well-positioned. It's a relief to have a headrest that doesn't feel awkward or intrusive.Lastly, the seat cushion is impressively spacious and plush. It provides substantial comfort, even during prolonged periods of sitting. This is a significant upgrade in terms of comfort compared to other chairs.In summary, this chair is a remarkable blend of functionality, comfort, and sleek design. It's a game-changer for anyone who spends a lot of time at their desk. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Husband had a fairly new desk chair, wasn't a cheapie either, but he was never comfortable in it, always shifting around in it. Started complaining about his back hurting. I am so glad that I found this COLAMY office chair on Amazon. I read so many good reviews about it, and ordered it as a surprise for my husband. It is VERY STURDY, and it was pretty easy to put it together. His back aches stopped right away, he says it is super comfortable, and the high back of it is great! He uses it at his desk while at his computer, and the way he can adjust the arm rests and easily move them out of the way, it is good for his guitar playing too! The price was really, really good for the quality and look of this chair. Really, really great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Comfortsble to me
reviews.reviewText: This chair was great from a construction as well as fit and finish. The wheel system was remarkable for mobility, and it was easy to raise, lower and make tension adjustments for the seat. The leatherette material (it might even have been leather - I couldn't tell) was well done and superbly stitched. The padding for the seat and the back was at least 2 inches, however I could never feel comfortable in that seat. Perhaps it's my body mass or bone structure but I'm under the 300 pounds the posting indicated it would accommodate. There were other reviews which indicated they experienced all day comfort so I'm leaning towards my long-term experience using LazyBoy office chairs which are extremely comfortable. Customer service was great and I was afforded easy and free return shipping. I wish I could have felt comfortable in that chair. It was an incredible bargain too boot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I'm 5'9" and 187lbs and at it's lowest setting, my feet just fit flat on the floor...and I have fairly long legs. Leaning back isn't super easy either on it's softest setting as I'm not heavy enough.That said, I'm happy with the chair, looks great, is comfortable and was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wheels move well, chair is roomy and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This chair was a breeze to assemble using the allen-wrench with handle that’s included!The wheels are well constructed and roll smoother than the typical caster wheels from previous office chairs I’ve purchased.The arms can be lifted up out of the way which is helpful in tight spaces.The chair backing is padded and has a nice headrest that is not awkward to use.The cushion is wide and well padded for extra comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A mixed bag
reviews.reviewText: The good: Arrived quickly, was easy to put together, and the materials are good for this price point. The available adjustments work well, but more adjustments are needed like lumbar. The cushioning is decent, but would not want to sit in this chair for more than an hour at a time without a break. While the flip up armrests can come in handy for storage, it does weaken the arms so that you get some bend when you use the arms to get out of the chair.The not so good: You can't adjust the tilt angle of the seat bottom which means the angle between the seat bottom and seat back is fixed. For me, the angle is too upright. If I could adjust the seat bottom tilt, I could add angle to make it far more comfortable. The other big issue is the front of the seat bottom is pretty flat unlike many executive chairs that have a front seat bottom that slopes downward. Being flat, it puts a lot of pressure underneath your thighs and almost cuts off your circulation. After about an hour of sitting, I have to get up for a while cuz I start to hurt. If it were easier to return, I probably would.Additional: There were many very positive reviews for this chair when I purchased it, and a big reason why I did. Now there are very few review almost like this is a new product. What happened? Product change, page reset? Very odd, and wondering if I really got the chair I ordered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great video to put it together. So easy. And the final quality is so comfortable and sturdy for my weight. Love it. And I like the wheels the best on my wood floor. I am not worried about scratches at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with chair nice Wheels
reviews.reviewText: Chair is great. Easy to put together and comfortable. Wheels are awesone.
